attributes.action: Stop telephone hacking of bereaved families Prestana Hart
attributes.additional_details: After the death of a loved one the last thing needed is you and your families telephones hacked into , your personal family conversations recorded and your life being put on public display .Personal information compromised such as bank details and photographs putting yourself and your children at great risk. We would like the government to ensure that this sort of thing can never happen again in the name of justice.
